actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-702.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (S.  415) to amend the Education of the Handicapped Act to authorize the award of reasonable attorneys' fees to certain prevailing parties, and to clarify the effect of the Education of the Handicapped Act on rights, procedures, and remedies under other laws relating to the prohibition of discrimination.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on S. 415 (education of the handicapped).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (S.  415) to amend the Education of the Handicapped Act to authorize the award of reasonable attorneys' fees to certain prevailing parties, and to clarify the effect of the Education of the Handicapped Act on rights, procedures, and remedies under other laws relating to the prohibition of discrimination.
